name: Easy Recipes
description: A platform for people who love cooking, functions almost like a real world website.
languages: HTML, CSS, Javascript, MongoDB, NodeJS, ExpressJS, React, TailwindCSS, Docker
challenges: I had trouble installing the finished Api server code onto my deskstop because of the issues in the versions, and this was when I first heard about Docker.
outcomes: Learnt the basic of Docker and Nginx, and how Docker functions.

name: Social
description: A Social Media Platform where people interact.
challenges: I had a bump in using React, ExpressJS, Material UI, and MongoDB. I faced a lot of challenges.
outcomes: I got to learn about pre-made UIs, Node, how object-based database works, and more about Api.

name: Shop
description: An E-commerce website where people can buy things easily.
challenges: I created this project to review everything I used in Social app, but there was an obstacle in posting images into the database, and cropping images
outcomes: I got to know about React image crop, and Multer.

name: Next Movies
description: A website to give a brief information and rating about a movie that users are going to watch. (used TMDB api)
challenges: My first step into using Api and NextJS after learning the basic of React, and have a lot of trouble debugging.
outcomes: It contributes to my knowledge how Api functions, and shows me how serverside code works.

name: Guess the Color
description: A game website I inspired from online with JS, CSS, and HTML.
challenges: My first time learning Javascript and wanted to know more about it.
outcomes: This project helps me deep dive into Javascript.

name: Portfolio
description: A website that I created to understand CSS layouts
challenges: I used to have a trouble with moving elements around and how CSS styles works when I started learning.
outcomes: I got to know how flex and grid works, how inline elements function, and frameworks related to CSS.
